name: Truly Experiences Ltd
description: Operator of an e-commerce platform designed to help in booking gift items that can be relived as memories by the person. The company's platform offers curated premium experiences including, a hand-picked collection of Michelin-starred tasting menus, city breaks, dining, tour and activities, and spa and pampering gifts for various occasions, enabling people to book a different and memorable experience gift or simply treat themselves.
